#436 "Batman: Year Three" part 1, featuring the first appearance of Tim Drake. As Batman investigates the murder of multiple mob bosses, Dick Grayson returns to Wayne Manor for the first time in two years--just in time for the parole hearing of Tony Zucco, the man responsible for the death of his parents!

#437 Alfred continues to remember the first Robin's early days. Meanwhile, Nightwing confronts Batman about his strange behavior over Jason Todd's death, and Tony Zucco receives news about his parole. "Batman: Year Three" part 2.

#438 Batman and Nightwing learn about Tony Zucco's impending release, but on the eve of the criminal's day of freedom, Alfred approaches him with a proposal. "Batman: Year Three" part 3.

#439 Batman and Nightwing continue their investigation separately, but information about Tony Zucco's book of secrets threatens to bring chaos to Gotham City. And when Nightwing confronts the man pulling the strings, will Batman have to watch another partner die? "Batman: Year Three" part 4.
